name: Company Code
title: CC
definition: Identifies the Exchange Carrier requesting local services.

validEntry.description: A four alpha/numeric character code structure for all
Exchange Carriers in North America and certain U.S.

usageNotes: Required when ordering local interconnection   services or unbundled network elements otherwise   prohibited.
fieldNotes: The format and structure of this field is defined by   ANSI in document T1.251 Identification of   Telecommunications Service Provider Codes for the   North American Telecommunications System.
